title: OH SHIT: Travis Scott Just Dropped A Sweet New Line Of Jordan-Approved Merch
text:
Friends, it is my duty to inform you that Travis Scott has collaborated with Jordan Brand for his latest batch of “Highest in the Room” merch – and it’s all available right now, for a limited time.

For the last little while Scott has been releasing his merch for 12 hour periods, but now the entire Highest in the Room catalogue is available. At least, for another four hours.

The line of t-shirts, hoodies, sweatpants, hats, and shorts coincides with the release of the Scott / Air Jordan collab.

It’s not clear how much those Jordans will cost ya, but you can register on Scott’s website to get updates. Oh yeah: you also have less than four hours to do so.

The rest of the merch will set you back a pretty penny, with shirts setting you back $55 USD and hoodies $95. The gear’s colour swatch revolves around browns, greens, and yellow, and is all adorned with the iconic Michael Jordan logo, too.

A previous batch of Highest in the Room merch has already sold out, so if you’re really keen it’s probably best not to hesitate.
